title: [QUESTION] Issue when building native wasm bindings
body:
Hi,

I'm trying to build SkiaSharp for a wasm project and I am running into an issue when building the native wasm libary.
I get this error message:
```
========================================
git-sync-deps
========================================
An error occurred when executing task 'git-sync-deps'.
Error: One or more errors occurred. (The libskia C++ API version did not match the expected '88', instead was ''.)
        The libskia C++ API version did not match the expected '88', instead was ''.
An error occurred when executing task 'externals-wasm'.
Error: One or more errors occurred. (.NET Core CLI: Process returned an error (exit code 1).)
        .NET Core CLI: Process returned an error (exit code 1).
```

I've been using these steps to setup the project https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/wiki/Building-SkiaSharp .
Am I missing some external dependencies?
I want to build the wasm library myself because I want to try out different emscripten settings. So I am not able to use the prebuild library.

comments.author: MPurscheUnity
comments.body: I found the issue myself. I didn't noticed that this project uses git submodules so I forgot to run `git submodule init && git submodule update` before the build. Maybe, that could be added to the build wiki.
